ygData.subject: Re: Corpse Looting and other anti-social behavior
ygData.msgSnippet: Because Verant is evil.  There are loads of dumb things that they leave in because they know that it will cause trouble (game dynamics, persona, people
ygData.messageBody:
Because Verant is evil. There are loads of 'dumb' things that they leave in
because they know that it will cause trouble (game dynamics, persona, people
factor, whatever). Once you talk to Brad in person and see that maniac like
twinkle in his eyes, you will understand (he is evil too btw.) Why do they
leave "a" as the default auto-attack key? To help people do quests? To
encourage them to "hail" npcs?

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: Kimes, Dean W. <dean_kimes@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, March 02, 2000 12:15 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Corpse Looting and other anti-social behavior


> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
>
> One thing I always thought was strange. Why didn't Verant make corpse
> dragging dependent on a different permission than looting?
